products.title: Woven Charcoal Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being simout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Every bit as luxurious as the range implies, the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey satin has a sleek, satiny finish, joined by the palest cool grey colouring. Matching fittings, including designer-look ladder ribbons made from high quality linen, enhance this fashionable look, offering a clean and simple aesthetic that you'll love. For a stylishly chic look, pair the blizzard grey satin with a navy blue feature wall and cool white furniture.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Steel Roller Blind
products.description: Make a contemporary impact on your home decor with the boheme steel double sided blackout roller blind. The simple yet bold effect of this leaf print motif is depicted on both sides of this tough, pvc roller blind, reflecting your funky interior style outside. This two-tone pattern of white and steel grey is so versatile and can be effectively teamed with a range of colours to create your desired look.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: When you want something decidedly neutral and contemporary, this handsome design will work perfectly. The easy stone colour is ideal to blend with subtle dcor and the generous curvy modern double-sided leaf pattern is a timeless choice. A high-quality finish that is flame retardant; boheme pvc blackout stone grey roller blind is crafted out of a special blackout fabric so light won't travel into your room when closed.

products.title: Lintex Pvc Blackout Graphite Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Marina Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Smart and timeless, isla pvc blackout marina grey roller blind gives you an air of refined sophistication wherever you choose to feature it. With a double-sided pattern consisting of gently curving leaves in a variety of different sizes, it provides a subtle focal point in your room of choice. The isla marina uses a special blackout material, ideal for shutting out the daylight when you need to and its flame retardant for extra safety.

products.description: This range of fabrics feature an effective reflective treatment to the reverse of the fabric to reduce heat and glare keeping your room pleasant in the height of summer whilst also being effective for privacy. products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cosmic Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cosmic grey is a semi-translucent stylish, light grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. A flame retardant coating, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Wow Factor, Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. Use the pull-cord to adjust the slats at ease, allowing as much or as little light as you like to filter through. The attractive industriousness of the silver crackle makes for the perfect accent to a retro kitchen in a monochrome colour scheme.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey 127mm vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer 127mm vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Basix Plain Flint Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix plain range is simple and effective method of freshening up your decor. This dark grey 127mm vertical blind is a modern grey shade, made of durable fabric, and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and dark grey is an easy colour to mix and match accessories with. Part of their pollergen-coated fabrics, this blind is fantastic in high-pollen seasons as its fabric is pollen-resistant, making this a great blind for hay-fever sufferers.

products.title: Basix Blackout Shale Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This medium grey 127mm vertical blind, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a grey blind instantly revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons.

products.title: Basix Blackout Pumice Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A mixture of grey with a hint of beige, their basix blackout pumice grey 127mm vertical blind is easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This grey/brown 127mm vertical blind, a medium neutral shade, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a new blind instantly refreshes and revitalises tired-looking window.

products.title: Basix Blackout Mist Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is an easy and effective method of freshening up your decor. This light soft grey 127mm vertical blind, is made of durable fabric and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and a light grey blind instantly revitalises tired-looking window. Pollergen-coated, this blackout vertical blind also helps allergy sufferers with its pollen-resistant fabric, a must for high-pollen seasons.

products.title: Basix Blackout Charcoal Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their basix blackout range is simple and effective method of freshening up your decor. This dark grey 127mm vertical blind is a cool-toned shade, made of durable fabric, and stylish 5 inch vanes. Updating your window blind is a simple way to update the room, and grey is an easy colour to mix and match accessories with. Dress your bedroom or living room with this vertical blind, which as well as being a blackout fabric is anti-allergy treated, to help you live out your days allergy-free.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look is finished off with coordinating linen ladders for easy adjustments. Grey looks good with anything, but the castle grey satin will look especially striking when used as part of a light and airy, white monochrome colour scheme, perfect for a home office or study.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the look whole. Craft a chic and contemporary haven in your master bedroom by blending the chic grey satin with pale, lemon yellow walls and matching grey trim. Include pretty florals featuring coordinating shades of yellow and grey, and don't forget to add plenty of luxe fabrics for extra cosiness.

products.title: Amor Washed Pebble Roller Blind
products.description: Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

products.title: Amor Dolphin Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Add a darker grey tone to your room with the amor dolphin grey blackout roller blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms.

products.title: Amor Soft Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The light grey amor soft grey is a blind that suits a more natural looking room. Shades of stone and creams work well with this fabric but also as a contrast to darker tones of blue, brown and purple. This fabric is inoffensive and would suit any number of rooms. The amor fabrics are brilliant blackout blinds. They are ideal for bedrooms, bathrooms and kitchens. They are a durable and tough material which won't fade in the light.

products.title: Amor Shark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The deeper grey colour of the amor shark grey is one that will certainly make a statement in any room. Whether going in a bedroom, living room or bathroom this blind will fit in anywhere. This blind works especially well in modern interiors in place of black. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.
